body_html:
This worked for me.

python -m pip install --upgrade https://storage.googleapis.com/tensorflow/mac/cpu/tensorflow-0.12.0-py3-none-any.whl

However, I'm trying to use plaidbranch with Python 3.7. However, the following message appears:
PS C:\Users\darlan-pc\Documents\PlaidML\plaidbench> python .\plaidbench.py --no-plaid resnet50 Using TensorFlow backend. Error: Missing needed packages for benchmark; to fix, pip install keras tensorflow

I will try to run with version 3.6... or as @amitection had said 3.5, but according to the Tensorflow documentation version 3.6.x works

I will try to run with version 3.6... or as @amitection had said 3.5, but according to the Tensorflow documentation version 3.6.x works
body:
This worked for me.
> python -m pip install --upgrade https://storage.googleapis.com/tensorflow/mac/cpu/tensorflow-0.12.0-py3-none-any.whl

However, I'm trying to use plaidbranch with Python 3.7. However, the following message appears:
`PS C:\Users\darlan-pc\Documents\PlaidML\plaidbench>  python .\plaidbench.py --no-plaid resnet50
Using TensorFlow backend.
Error: Missing needed packages for benchmark; to fix, pip install keras tensorflow`

I will try to run with version 3.6... or as @amitection had said 3.5, but according to the Tensorflow documentation version 3.6.x works
